en.title: FusionExcel's BEP at Kapar, Klang.
en.content:
REPORT BY FE LEADER ANDREW LEONG.

FE held 2 BEP's in Kapar, Klang, 2 weeks in a roll, to satisfy the demands of the people. At the first meeting one week earlier, the participants were mainly housewives who were keen to know how the QP can help improve one's health. Hence, the 2nd week the invited key speaker was FE's Spokesman, Dr. Li who is a doctor by profession at the National Sports Centre.

From the start, Dr. Li touched on how the Quantum Pendant helped his patients and improved healthy people's lifestyle. Much knowledge and personal experiences were shared. The ambiance was relaxing.

Once the presentations were over, a couple of simple demonstrations were conducted and a comparison was made between FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant and "X" brand pendant that claimed to be better than FE's QP. The results clearly showed that FE's Quantum Pendant was far superior!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
